name: NSSpellServer
desc: A server that your app uses to provide a spell checker service to other apps running in the system.

items.name: func registerLanguage(String?, byVendor: String?) -> Bool
items.desc: Notifies the receiver of a language your spelling checker can check.

items.name: func run()
items.desc: Causes the receiver to start listening for spell-checking requests.

items.name: func isWord(inUserDictionaries: String, caseSensitive: Bool) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether a given word is in the user’s list of learned words or the document’s list of words to ignore.
